body:
Config.KeyExchanges controls the algorithm for the ephemeral key (ie. what Diffie Hellman flavor is used),  and @kankowski is right that this is a bug.

I rather like the current callback based approach for checking the hostkey. I think the simplest and most flexible solution is to introduce a ClientConfig.HostKeyAlgorithms field. If you have a .known_hosts file, you could read it and populate the field based on that.
